main event: A military pilot observed a teardrop-shaped object near NAS North Island, California, on 2 July 1956 for about 2 hours.
interesting points: The object was described as having a tapered end at the bottom and was the size of a silver dollar., It was whitish silver in color and appeared to have ropes hanging down., The sighting was accidental and occurred with very little movement from the object., Four aircraft attempted to reach the object but were unsuccessful., The object remained in sight from 03/0110Z until darkness.
